title: FractalBench: Diagnosing Visual-Mathematical Reasoning Through Recursive Program Synthesis
summary: Mathematical reasoning requires abstracting symbolic rules from visual patterns -- inferring the infinite from the finite. We investigate whether multimodal AI systems possess this capability through FractalBench, a benchmark evaluating fractal program synthesis from images.
